title: 10 Command Line Recipes for Deep Learning on Amazon Web Services - Machine
excerpt: Running large deep learning processes on Amazon Web Services EC2 is a cheap and effective way to learn and develop models. For just a few dollars you can get access to tens of gigabytes of RAM, tens of CPU cores, and multiple GPUs. I highly recommend it. If you are new to EC2 or the Linux command line, there areâ€¦
